moves.2... a6: Preparing Nc6 but loses the e-pawn
moves.3. Nxe5 Qg5 4. Nf3: I could have played d4 discovered attack on Queen
moves.6. d4: ! winning the bishop plus a discovered attack on the queen
moves.7. Bxf4:
Black resigns.

Lessons to learn

1.) Watch out for discovered attacks
2.) Don't move queen in opening if your down on development and/or it can be attacked for easy lose of tempo
